name: Box
tag_list: box-net, file-sharing, backup, storage, share, cloud, cloud-computing, saas
overview: After starting as a college business project in 2005, Box was officially launched in March of 2006 with the vision of connecting people, devices and networks. Box provides more than 8 million users with secure cloud content management and collaboration. They say their platform “allows personal and commercial content to be accessible, sharable, and storable in any format from anywhere”.

image.attribution: Scale Venture Partners / Scale Venture Partners

funding_rounds.source_description: Box.net Adds $7.1 Million In Funding For Digital File Storage
Box.net Raises $15 Million To Take On Microsoft SharePoint In The Cloud
Enterprise Cloud Storage Platform Box.net Raises $48M From Andreessen Horowitz And Others
Cloud Storage Platform Box.net Raises $81M From Salesforce, SAP At $600M-Plus Valuation
Box Raises $125M To Target Global Growth And Large Enterprises, Round Led By General Atlantic
Box Receives Investment from Intel Capital

acquisitions.source_description: BOX ACQUIRING CROCODOC TO REIMAGINE DOCUMENTS IN THE CLOUD
Box Buys French File Storage App Folders To Help Rebuild Its Mobile Apps

milestones.description: File Comments, Box Enterprise, and Twitter, and more!
milestones.source_text:
File Comments and List View:
When you log into your Box account, you'll notice some new functionality. First, we've improved and expanded List View-- you can now display 'Options' and 'Share' functions below each file name. There is also a new 'Comments' feature that lets you leave notes and comments for individual files - which can be pretty handy, especially when you are collaborating with others on Box. So switch up your settings, we think you'll like it!


Box Community Notes: 
Box users don't always realize that when they sign up for an account, they
are also joining a community that is nearly 2 million strong!
They might also be surprised by how many ways there are to connect with us here at the company, as well as other members of the Box community. So this month, check out the Box Blog for news, updates and commentary from inside the Box. Don't be shy to jump in and leave a thought or suggestion either - the more the merrier! Also this month, you can start following us on Twitter (boxdotnet). Shoot a quick question, thought or tip to @boxdotnet and we'll be sure to check it out
and get back to you.

Coming Soon to Your Box: 
Make sure to keep an eye on your Box this summer, we have some exciting features to announce including an online notes feature, as well as a really useful network tool.

Box.net Quick Tip:
Want to get your whole business or department on Box.net? Just pass your IT manager Jim's email address (jim@box.net), or download Box.net's Enterprise Overview PDF for more info about how to get your group connected.
milestones.source_description: File Comments, Box Enterprise, and Twitter, and more!
